trans-unit.source: Represents security information for client application services, which includes role information.
trans-unit.target: Representa informações de segurança para serviços do aplicativo cliente, as quais incluem informações de função.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando você validar um usuário nos serviços de aplicativo cliente, o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> ou <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> define o `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade a uma instância dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade para uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objeto retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: You will not typically access this class directly.
trans-unit.target: Você não geralmente acessará essa classe diretamente.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você chamará o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> método o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode converter o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> valor da propriedade para um <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> referência para chamar o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> método explicitamente, conforme demonstrado na seção de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to display a button only when the user is in the "manager" role.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar essa classe para exibir um botão somente quando o usuário está na função de "gerente".

trans-unit.source: This example requires a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `managerOnlyButton` with an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `managerOnlyButton` com um inicial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> valor da propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Representa o usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property is initialized with the value of the `identity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade é inicializada com o valor de `identity` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando você validar um usuário nos serviços de aplicativo cliente, o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> ou <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> define o `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade a uma instância dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade para uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objeto retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a identidade de segurança associada a <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: Representa o usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Quando você validar um usuário nos serviços de aplicativo cliente, o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> ou <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> define o `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade a uma instância dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade para uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> inicializa o <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> objeto retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The role to check.
trans-unit.target: A função a verificar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" /> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o usuário representado por <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal" /> está na função especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is in the specified role; <see langword="false" /> if the user is not in the specified role or is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o usuário está na função especificada; <see langword="false" /> se o usuário não está autenticado ou não está na função especificada.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você chamará o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> método o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> retornado pelo `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call this method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode converter o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> valor da propriedade para um <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> referência para chamar esse método explicitamente, conforme demonstrado na seção de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method will always return `false` if the user login has expired.
trans-unit.target: O método <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> sempre retornará `false` se o logon do usuário tiver expirado.

trans-unit.source: This will not occur if your application calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method one time shortly after authentication.
trans-unit.target: Isso não ocorrerá se o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> método uma vez logo após a autenticação.

trans-unit.source: If your application must retrieve user roles at other times, you might want to add code to revalidate users whose login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo precisar recuperar funções de usuário em outros momentos, convém adicionar código para revalidar usuários cujo logon tiver expirado.

trans-unit.source: If all valid users are assigned to roles, you can determine whether the login has expired by calling the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os usuários válidos forem atribuídos às funções, você poderá determinar se o logon expirou chamando o método <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If no roles are returned, the login has expired.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma função tiver sido retornada, isso significará que o logon expirou.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this functionality, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para ver um exemplo dessa funcionalidade, consulte o método <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only necessary if you have selected **Require users to log on again whenever the server cookie expires** in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: Essa funcionalidade somente será necessária se você tiver selecionado **Exigir que os usuários façam logon novamente sempre que o cookie de servidor expirar** na configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Como configurar serviços de aplicativo cliente](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to display a button only when the user is in the "manager" role.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar esse método para exibir um botão somente quando o usuário está na função de "gerente".

trans-unit.source: This example requires a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `managerOnlyButton` with an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `managerOnlyButton` com um inicial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> valor da propriedade `false`.
